title: 2819 Winchester Ave - Absolutely stunning, stone front split-level
description: Absolutely stunning, stone front split-level situated across from the park in desirable Winchester Park that has been expanded and updated throughout. Arrive and you will immediately fall in love with the extensive hardscaping and picture yourself relaxing on your front patio while enjoying the beautiful year-round wooded views of Pennypack Park. Enter and be prepared to be wowed beginning with the exposed hardwood floors, crown moldings, elegant fixtures and fresh paint throughout. The main living area offers an open concept with an array of natural light, formal dining area with beautiful chandelier and opens to the gourmet kitchen complete with an abundance of new cabinets, granite counters with subway tiled backsplash, stainless steel appliances that includes a gas range, refrigerator that is included, built-in microwave & dishwasher and breakfast bar with awesome pendant lights. Continue to the rear addition that acts as the family/great room with vaulted ceilings, recessed lights, ceiling fan, stacked stone gas fireplace with mood lighting and provides access to the private rear yard with huge, maintenance free deck with direct natural gas line to the grill which is included & storage shed. The 2nd level hosts a primary suite consisting of a large bedroom with ceiling fan & mounted TV, walk-in closet and spa-like bathroom with beautifully tiled surround, stall shower, toilet & vintage vanity. Continue to find 2 additional bedrooms, both with ceiling fans & adequate closet space, as well as a 3-piece ceramic tile bathroom with tiled surround, soaking tub/shower combo toilet & vanity. The 3rd level hosts the large, 4th bedroom with ceiling fan and provides access to the attic which is currently used for storage but can easily be finished into a 5th bedroom or additional living area. The lower level is a finished den which is currently used for storage and has a separate laundry room with washer & dryer that are included, powder room and interior access to the 1-car garage with electric opener. The front driveway was redone 1-year ago with new concrete & accent pavers that can accommodate off-street parking for 2 cars, extensive hardscaping including lighting and EP-Henry pavers & steps leading to the main entrance. Additional features are newer central air heater & water heater, updated electric, replacement windows throughout, crawl space for extra storage and the list could go on. Conveniently located within walking distance to shopping, restaurants, St Jerome school and Pennypack Park. Truly a gorgeous home in one of the most desirable neighborhoods in the city. Will not disappoint. ☎ WE ARE OPEN and would love to show you around, please call to schedule your tour!  show contact info

title: Enjoy magnificent views of the delaware river,
description:

Beautiful oak hardwood floors run throughout the unit. The kitchen boasts frigidaire stainless steel appliances, natural stone and porcelain backsplash, granite counters, and wood cabinets. title: Gorgeous 3 bedroom / 1.5 bathroom single family home!!
description: E Firth St,  Welcome to 2304 E Firth St! This gorgeous 3 bedroom / 1.5 bathroom single family home features a bright and spacious interior plus great outdoor space. The homeowners made sure to embrace the charm of the original build and mixed in luxury updates throughout. A vintage tiled entryway vestibule leads you into the large living room. There is a big window at the front for sunlight, a ceiling fan, decorative fireplace, and ample space for different furniture setups. Continue back to the dining area, which can easily accommodate a full dining table set and offers a half bath with detailed tiling. Your modern kitchen is towards the back of the main level, equipped with granite countertops, ample white shaker cabinets, white subway tile backsplash, a window over the sink, stainless steel appliances, and counter seating. From here, you can access your back patio. This entire floor is perfect for cozying up alone or entertaining many guests. Continue upstairs to the second floor with your primary room to the front, boasting a beautiful, vintage wood built-in closet, 2 windows, and a ceiling fan. The middle bedroom is currently used as additional closet space & at-home gym but can absolutely work as a nice bedroom. Another small bedroom to the back showcases lovely french doors that open onto your nicely sized balcony. Your full bathroom is also on this level with a shower / tub combo. There is an unfinished basement with washer & dryer, plus good storage space. You'll be right off of I-95 and surrounded by ample public transport for a quick commute. Walkable to Aramingo Square, Konrad Square, and POPS Skatepark. Local neighborhood hotspots include Memphis Taproom, Cook & Shaker, The Fresh Works, Loco Pez, Martha, Green Eggs Cafe, and countless more. Schedule a tour today! The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, or Di Bruno Bros. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then buy a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at the Walnut Street Theatre. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday. There is so much to do in this area!

title: Don’t miss this well maintained 5 BR 4 bath home!!
description: Quincy St, Between 2013-2019, the previous owners of this 3-story center hall stone colonial in historic Pelham in West Mount Airy lovingly renovated it with extraordinary care.  The current owners have continued its attentive maintenance.    Every inch of plumbing, every inch of electrical wiring have been replaced. All windows have been replaced.  You will find new gas-fired high efficiency heat and central air conditioning with 3 zones and new hot water heater--all since 2013.  More upgrades:   most all interior doors have been replaced; brand new covered entry at the front door; new electronic ventless gas fireplace that opens to both the living room and sunroom; sunroom essentially rebuilt with insulated windows and ceiling fans. The sunny dining room retains all its original wall wainscot and plate rails.  The spacious eat-in kitchen boasts granite counters and ceramic tile backsplash, multiple cabinetry, stainless steel appliances including a top-of-the-line electric range with 2 ovens/broilers (gas line below the floor in case a new owner wants gas cooking), very recent microwave and garbage disposal;  powder room and laundry are at the end of the kitchen with exit to rear yard.  Upstairs are 5 bedrooms and 3 baths including a master bedroom suite with a master bath to die for!  You can't miss the gleaming oak hardwood and southern pine floors.  Closets are terrific.  The unfinished basement is spotless for utilities, storage and work area as well as a separately temperature controlled wine storage room.   Please note that the current owners have used half the basement as a family room, and the wine storage room has become a terrific music room.  Please review the seller disclosure statement for a full listing of the substantial work and thoughtful upgrades that enhance this home.  Detached 2-car garage.  6828 Quincy Street is located on a favorite block of Pelham just a few steps from the Carpenter Lane Station on SEPTA's Chestnut Hill West commuter line.  It is a short walk to the shops on Germantown Avenue.  This property will be easy to show.  Settlement date flexible.  MORE PHOTOS to come.  Showings start Friday, 7/8. **Please note a real estate tax reassessment will be effective January 1, 2023. If you have any questions or concerns about the impact of this process on the future real estate taxes for this property, please contact the City of Philadelphia. -- *Contact for showings and information at  show contact info

title: 1 bed/1 bath bi-level apartment with yard
description:
Tranquil living in the city!
1 bed/1 bath bi-level apartment in East Falls. Five-minute walk to the train station. Part of an owner-occupied duplex. The last tenants were here for 7 years!
Washer/dryer in unit, new dishwasher, self-cleaning oven, recent refrigerator, NEW carpet on stairs and 2nd floor, and fresh paint throughout. NEW mini-split heat pump on first floor which will heat and cool the living room and kitchen. Second floor heat is electric baseboard and window a/c.
Large back yard shared with owners is available for tenants to enjoy, as well as a gas grill.
Tenant pays electric. Water, hot water, and gas for the stove are included.
Available 8/15. Sorry but no dogs. Cats can be considered. First/last/security due at start of lease. Application will include a background/credit check and fee of $42. References strongly encouraged. $1150/month for 12-month lease.

title: Smoke-free apartments available, New fitness center, Elevator building
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. Our apartments for rent on the Main Line are near Villanova University and located in Lower Merion School District. Located less than 10 miles from Center City, our rentals appeal to Philadelphia apartment shoppers. In addition to traditional residential apartments, we provide corporate and furnished options, and every one includes a long list of great amenities. Living in Haverford, PA at Korman Residential on the Main Line places you two blocks from SEPTA’s regional rail station and close to major roadways so traveling to the city and the surrounding suburbs is convenient. Contact a leasing agent to schedule a personal tour of our Haverford apartments.

The Crafts House takes its name from the turn-of-the-century arts and crafts movement. Each apartment received many hours of individual architectural attention and custom carpentry resulting in elegant bi-levels, tri-levels, and flats, some with private entrances. The 55 apartments feature individually designed glass kitchen cabinets with new base cabinets and quartz countertops. Units also feature large walk in showers and/or over-sized soaking tubs. Many units feature plank flooring in living room & kitchen and carpeted bedrooms. Living at Crafts House Apartments puts you in the heart of the excitement of Old City.

title: 1 Bedroom Light Filled Apartment, Great Neighborhood
description:
Bright and airy second floor apartment on a quiet block in Graduate Hospital across from Naval Square.  Well-lit entrance with planter, then step inside to a light-filled apartment with windows on north, west, and south sides!  Large bedroom full of character with hardwood floors, unique details, and a large bay window; Queen bed and desk fit comfortably. Fan and large closet.  Kitchen: range/ oven, fridge, microwave and garbage disposal.  Full bath with shower and privacy window. Window AC units.
Close to UPenn, Drexel, Schuylkill River Trail, and I-76. Walk to Rittenhouse in 20 min, 2 bus routes within 2 blocks and near 2 Indego stations.  3 blocks to South Street. Great neighborhood with groceries, restaurants, local shops, CVS, Wawa, Starbucks, and live music & ice cream at the Triangles.
Owner covers water/ snow removal/ planter maintenance.  Tenant pays gas/ electric/ cable. Cats allowed at owners discretion with additional deposit. Available August.
Deposit, first and last month due at signing. Application is online (with a nominal fee) and includes a credit & background check. No smoking in apartment. Cats allowed, no dogs please.
***We will be showing the apartment THIS SATURDAY, 7/9, between 10am and 1pm. Please email for a time slot.***

title: LARGE Beautiful 1 BR/1.5 Bath  Apt in Old City
description:
This one bedroom and 1.5 bathroom apartment is almost 1200 SQ FT! The apartment is perfect for a couple or even a solo renter looking to be in the beautiful neighborhood of Old City. This is a first floor unit in a double door secured building. Ceilings are 15 feet high with floor to ceiling windows spanning from the living room to the bedroom. There are two walk in closets in the bedroom and additional closet space in the main common areas. There is a washer and dryer in unit as well as all other necessary appliances. Located on a quiet side street in Old City you are just steps away from coffee shops, some of the best food Philadelphia has to offer, plenty of parks, and all of the historic sites one would want to see!
*Monthly parking lot options within one block.
**This apartment is available for Sept 1 move in but there is potential for earlier (in August) if needed.
